import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search users via modular service"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pub/iq-modules-users-search/v1/users"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Queries the modular user search service using the standard Incident IQ facet model. Spare workflows invoke this endpoint to fetch detailed agent records when resolving ticket recommendations.

**Prerequisites**
1. **Filters** â€“ Determine the filter set required for the workflow (for example, `Facet: "user"` with the agent's identifier).

**Workflow Example**
1. Build the request payload using the authenticated agent's identifier: `{ "Filters": [{ "Facet": "user", "Id": "<userId>" }] }`.
2. POST to /pub/iq-modules-users-search/v1/users to retrieve full user metadata, including site, role, and custom field context.
3. Use the returned `Items[]` data to render the agent card within the spare return timeline entry.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Filters[].

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of user records to return per page.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":1},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to return.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$v","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Optional version flag observed in captured workflows. The default of `0` requests the latest projection.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

This schema is the user-specific implementation of the universal `FilterMatch` pattern used across all Incident IQ search endpoints. See `FilterMatch` schema for cross-entity documentation and `UserSearchFacetKey` for the 41 supported user facets.","properties":{"Facet":{"allOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Facet keys for user search (entity type `888891ac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00003`). The supported facets are organized by category:\n\n## User Identity\n| Facet | Description | Value Type |\n|-------|-------------|------------|\n| `user` | Specific user | UUID |\n| `username` | Username | String |\n| `email` | Email address | String |\n| `personalemail` | Personal email | String |\n| `schoolidnumber` | School ID number | String |\n| `keyword` | Full-text search | String |\n| `requestorlastnamesearch` | Last name search | String |\n\n## Role & Classification\n| Facet | Description | Value Type |\n|-------|-------------|------------|\n| `role` | User role | UUID |\n| `grade` | Grade level | UUID |\n| `department` | Department | UUID |\n| `jobtitle` | Job title | String |\n| `employmentstatus` | Employment status | UUID |\n| `userstatus` | User account status | |\n|-------|-------------|------------|\n| `hasassigneddevice` | Has assigned device | Boolean |\n| `usermultipledevices` | Has multiple devices | Boolean |\n\n## Forms & Documents\n| Facet | `authenticatedby` | Authentication provider | String |\n| `userapplink` | App integration link | UUID |\n\n## SIS Integration\n| Facet | Description | Value Type |\n|-------|-------------|------------|\n| `sisuserstatus` | SIS user status | UUID |\n| `sisclass` | SIS class | UUID |\n| `siscourse` | SIS course | UUID |\n| `sisteacher` | SIS teacher | UUID |\n\n## Duplicates & Data Quality\n| Facet | Description | Value Type |\n|-------|-------------|------------|\n| `userduplicateany` | Any duplicate detected | Boolean |\n| `userduplicateemail` | Duplicate email | Boolean |\n| `userduplicateschoolid` | Duplicate school ID | Boolean |\n| `userduplicateusername` | Duplicate username | Boolean |\n\n## Custom & Extended\n| Facet | Description | Value Type |\n|-------|-------------|------------|\n| `userattribute` | User attributes | UUID |\n| `usercustomfield` | Custom field values | UUID |\n| `userappattribute` | App-specific attributes | `installedapp` | Installed app | UUID |\n| `licensedproduct` | Licensed product | UUID |\n\nCall `/api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/{entityTypeId}` to retrieve the latest supported facet to evaluate. Each facet expects specific supporting fields (Id, Name, or Value) as documented in `x-facet-definitions`.","example":"role"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display-friendly label associated with the facet option. Boolean-style facets expect `yes` or `no`.","example":"Student"},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the facet option to match when the facet operates on entity identifiers (for example, RoleId, SiteId, TeamId).","example":"6d5fee76-e05e-43c0-b8e9-b8447746e501"},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"Filter expression value when the facet accepts comparison operators. Syntax varies by facet type:\n\n- **Date facets**: See `DateExpressionSyntax` schema for full syntax (e.g., `range:thisweek`, `date>=01/01/2024`, `range:lastdays:30`)\n- **Numeric facets**: See `NumericExpressionSyntax` schema (e.g., `numoperator:greaterthan:100`)\n- **Keyword**: Plain text search term\n- **Boolean**: `true` or `false`","example":"range:thisweek"}},"required":["Facet"],"x-facet-definitions":{"user":{"fields":{"Id":"UserId","Value":"UserName"},"description":"Matches a specific user by identifier or username."},"location":{"fields":{"Id":"LocationId"},"description":"Filters users by associated location."},"locationtype":{"fields":{"Id":"LocationTypeId"},"description":"Restricts results to users associated with locations of a given type."},"role":{"fields":{"Id":"RoleId","Name":"Role display name"},"description":"Filters to users that hold a specific role."},"source":{"fields":{"Value":"SourceId"},"description":"Matches users synchronized from a specific source system."},"site":{"fields":{"Id":"SiteId"},"description":"Filters by the site the user belongs to."},"keyword":{"fields":{"Value":"Text matched against first name, last name, username, email, or school ID number."},"description":"Performs a keyword match across common user identity identifier."},"sisclass":{"fields":{"Id":"CourseId"},"description":"Matches SIS class identifiers."},"siscourse":{"fields":{"Id":"CourseId"},"description":"Filters by SIS course identifiers."},"sisteacher":{"fields":{"Id":"UserId"},"description":"Returns users associated with a specific SIS teacher."},"sisuserstatus":{"fields":{"Value":"Enum values such as `active`, conflicts."},"userduplicateusername":{"fields":{"Name":"yes|no","Value":"yes|no"},"description":"Filters users with duplicate usernames."},"userduplicateemail":{"fields":{"Name":"yes|no","Value":"yes|no"},"description":"Filters users with duplicate email addresses."},"userduplicateschoolid":{"fields":{"Name":"yes|no","Value":"yes|no"},"description":"Filters users with duplicate school ID numbers."},"usermultipledevices":{"fields":{"Name":"yes|no","Value":"yes|no"},"description":"Identifies users assigned to more than one device."},"team":{"fields":{"Id":"TeamId"},"description":"Limits results to members of a specific team."},"jobtitle":{"fields":{"Value":"JobTitle"},"description":"Filters by the job title value."},"personalemail":{"fields":{"Value":"Email"},"description":"Matches on a user's personal email address."},"supervisor":{"fields":{"Value":"Supervisor"},"description":"Filters by supervisor name."},"pronouns":{"fields":{"Value":"Pronouns"},"description":"Matches users by stored pronoun values."},"form":{"fields":{"Id":"FormId"},"description":"Filters users associated with a specific form."},"formstatus":{"fields":{"Id":"FormStatusId"},"description":"Filters form interactions by status."},"formsubmissionstatus":{"fields":{"Id":"FormSubmissionStatusId"},"description":"Matches users with submissions in a given status."},"hasfileswithincategory":{"fields":{"Id":"CategoryId"},"description":"Filters users that have uploaded files within a specific category."},"hasfileswithkeyword":{"fields":{"Value":"Keyword matched against file metadata."},"description":"Filters users with files matching the provided keyword."},"department":{"fields":{"Id":"DepartmentId"},"description":"Filters by department."},"employmentstatus":{"fields":{"Id":"EmploymentStatusId"},"description":"Filters by employment status."},"userstatus":{"fields":{"Id":"UserStatusId"},"description":"Filters users by application-specific status."},"licensedproduct":{"fields":{"Id":"ProductId"},"description":"Filters users licensed for a specific product."},"installedapp":{"fields":{"Id":"AppId"},"description":"Filters users with a particular app installed."},"tag":{"fields":{"Id":"TagId"},"description":"Filters users associated with a tag."},"labortype":{"fields":{"Id":"LaborTypeId"},"description":"Filters labor entries by labor type."},"laborhourlyrate":{"fields":{"Value":"String expressions such as `numoperator:equals:25` or `numoperator:lessthan:15`."},"description":"Filters labor-rate metadata using numeric comparison operators."},"laboractivitydate":{"fields":{"Value":"Date expressions such as `date:20250101`, `date<=20250131`, `date>=20250101`."},"description":"Filters by labor activity date using comparison operators."},"authenticatedby":{"fields":{"Value":"Authentication provider name"},"description":"Filters users by their authentication provider (e.g., local, SAML, OAuth)."},"email":{"fields":{"Value":"Email address"},"description":"Filters users by their primary email address."},"hasassigneddevice":{"fields":{"Name":"yes|no","Value":"yes|no"},"description":"Identifies users who have at least one assigned device."},"orgunit":{"fields":{"Id":"OrgUnitId"},"description":"Filters users by organizational unit."},"performedbyapp":{"fields":{"Id":"AppId"},"description":"Filters labor entries by the app that performed the action."},"requestorlastnamesearch":{"fields":{"Value":"Last name search term"},"description":"Searches for users by last name prefix."},"userapplink":{"fields":{"Id":"AppLinkId"},"description":"Filters users linked to a specific external application."},"usercustomfield":{"fields":{"Id":"CustomFieldTypeId","Value":"Custom field value"},"description":"Filters by custom field values. Requires both the custom field type ID and the value to match."},"username":{"fields":{"Value":"Username"},"description":"Filters users by their username."}},"title":"UserSearchFilter"}}},"required":["Filters"],"example":{"Filters":[{"Facet":"role","Name":"Student","Id":"6d5fee76-e05e-43c0-b8e9-b8447746e501"},{"Facet":"keyword","Value":"iiq user"},{"Facet":"usermultipledevices","Name":"yes","Value":"yes"}]},"title":"UserSearchRequest"}}}}}
